title: Windows 7 Ultimate.SP1 x86 Integrated February 2014 ENG-RUS-GER-

Medicine:
Type of medicine: KMS activator (180 days)

System requirements:
Processor: 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor with a clock speed of 1.8 gigahertz (GHz) or higher
Memory: 1 GB or more (GB) (32-bit) or 2 GB or more (64-bit system), memory (RAM)
Video Card: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM driver version 1.0 or higher
Free space on HDD: 16 gigabytes (GB) (32-bit) or 20 GB (64-bit system) hard disk space

Description:
Before you orignalnye versions of Microsoft Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x86 by MicroSoft with integrated updates on February 15, 2014 and installed Internet Explorer 11. English, Ukrainian and German official language packs included.
